Lets a player's [[agent]] to collect all items within a one block from Agent in three dimensions.

== Syntax ==
: <code>collect <item: string></code>

== Arguments ==
<code>item: string</code>
: Specifies the item to be collected on the block to the Agent's inventory. Must be an [[bedrock Edition data values#Item IDs|item ID]], or a [[Bedrock Edition data values#Block IDs|block ID]] for which an item exists (for example, <code>golden_sword</code>).

== Result ==
Fails if the arguments are not specified correctly or no items of the same name were collected.

On success, returns if any items of the same name were collected.
